Article.ArticleTitle: Targeting gasdermin E in neurodegenerative diseases.

Abstract.AbstractText: Neel et al. identified pathophysiologic clues linking gasdermin-E (GSDME) with frontotemporal dementia and amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.1 Therapeutic studies targeting GSDME may provide a viable approach for neurodegenerative diseases.
